data_meta.titleEn: Describing a Situation of Lost Bag During Travel
data_meta.titleKo: Describing a Situation of Lost Bag During Travel

sentences.speaker: George
sentences.sentence: Excuse me, I seem to have a problem.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: When and where did you last see it?

sentences.speaker: George
sentences.sentence: I remember putting it down at the café around the corner about an hour ago.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: Did you have any valuables in it?

sentences.speaker: George
sentences.sentence: Yes, my passport and wallet were in there.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: Let's report this to the local police right away.

expressions.desc: 대화에서 George는 '없어졌다'라는 단어를 사용하여 그의 가방이 현재 없거나 찾을 수 없다는 것을 설명합니다.
expressions.example_en: My book is missing. I can't find it anywhere.
expressions.example_ko: 제 책이 없어졌어요. 어디에서도 찾을 수 없습니다.

sentences.sentence: 한 시간 전에 모퉁이에 있는 카페에서 두었다는 걸 기억합니다.
